mapper.insert: insert into activity (activity_id, activity_name, activity_desc, begin_date_time, end_date_time, stock_count, take_count, state, creator, create_time, update_time) value (#{activityId}, #{activityName}, #{activityDesc}, #{beginDateTime}, #{endDateTime}, #{stockCount}, #{takeCount}, #{state}, #{creator}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime});
